artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Random weft floats of various threads and textures, on plain weave ground. Olive, yellow, gold & rust warp. Olive weft. Stapls to 11x8.5" card. "H-5" printed on card. May be same as 99.1.1190.3 (olive, yellow, gold, rust)

title: Limelight
